meanings.definition: To groom (an animal) with a currycomb.
meanings.sent1: I currycombed my horse to make its coat shiny.
meanings.sent2: She currycombed her dog to remove tangles from its fur.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked surprised when I currycombed it with the brush.
meanings.sent4: After I currycombed the pony, its coat gleamed like polished wood.
meanings.sent5: Currycombing the cow made its fur soft and smooth.

meanings.sent1: The currycombed horse trotted proudly around the field.
meanings.sent2: The currycombed cat purred contentedly in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The currycombed dog wagged its tail happily after the grooming session.
meanings.sent4: Her currycombed hair shone in the sunlight like spun gold.
meanings.sent5: The currycombed cow looked neat and well-cared-for in the pasture.
